sentences.sContent: The wider the hinge, the further it folds.
sentences.sContent_eng: The wider the hinge, the further it folds.
sentences.sCn: 铰链角度越大，它能折的距离越远。

sentences.sContent: By varying the width of the black lines, or hinges, researchers are able to change how far each hinge folds.
sentences.sContent_eng: By varying the width of the black lines, or hinges, researchers are able to change how far each hinge folds.
sentences.sCn: 通过改变黑色线条或者铰链的宽度，研究员可以改变每条铰链可以折叠的范围。

sentences.sContent: Second, the heat has to be localized to the hinge in order to have fast and effective folding.
sentences.sContent_eng: Second, the heat has to be localized to the hinge in order to have fast and effective folding.
sentences.sCn: 第二，热量必须定位在铰链上，才可以更快更有效的进行折叠。

trans.tranOther: a piece of metal fastened to a door, lid etc that allows it to swing open and shut
